Title: Deploy Dataverse Schema
User Story: As an admin, I want the complete Dataverse schema deployed to the environment, so that the Canvas App has a data foundation to build on.

Title: Configure Security Roles
User Story: As an admin, I want security roles configured in Dataverse, so that users have appropriate access to tables based on their role.

Title: Create Canvas App Project
User Story: As a developer, I want the Canvas App project and Component Library created in the solution, so that feature development can begin.

Title: Build Sidebar Navigation
User Story: As a user, I want a persistent sidebar with navigation links to all sections, so that I can move between areas of the app.

Title: Implement User Context
User Story: As a user, I want the app to know who I am and what organizational units I belong to, so that filters and assignments default to my context.

Title: Build Section Routing
User Story: As a user, I want clicking a navigation item to display the corresponding section content, so that each area of the app is accessible.

Title: OKR List View
User Story: As a user, I want to see a list of Objectives with expandable Key Results, so that I can browse the OKR structure.
Components: Builds: po_StatusBadge, po_ProgressIndicator, po_EmptyState, po_ObjectiveCard, po_KeyResultCard

Title: Objective Create/Edit Form
User Story: As an Objective Owner, I want to create and edit Objectives via a side panel with all required fields.

Title: Key Result Create/Edit Form
User Story: As a team member, I want to create and edit Key Results within an Objective.

Title: Metric Definition on Key Results
User Story: As a team member, I want to define 1-3 metrics on each Key Result with scale, baseline, and target.

Title: Lifecycle Status Management
User Story: As an Objective Owner, I want to change the lifecycle status of Objectives and Key Results through valid transitions.

Title: Cascade Linking
User Story: As an Objective Owner, I want to link a Key Result to a lower-level Objective for cascading alignment.

Title: Filter Bar with Searchable Dropdowns
User Story: As a user, I want a filter bar with searchable dropdowns to narrow down Objectives by org unit, status, sprint, owner, or program.

Title: Pre-set Filters
User Story: As a user, I want quick-access pre-set filters (My OKRs, My Entity, My Domain) in the sidebar.

Title: Task Management on Key Results
User Story: As a team member, I want to create, complete, and delete tasks within a Key Result.

Title: Assign Objectives to Sprint and Programs
User Story: As an Objective Owner, I want to assign an Objective to a Sprint and optionally to Programs.

Title: Programs Dashboard
User Story: As a user, I want to view all programs as cards on a dashboard with key metrics.

Title: Program Create/Edit Form
User Story: As a Program Lead, I want to create and edit programs with description, leads, and linked objectives.

Title: Program Detail View
User Story: As a user, I want to view a program's full details including linked objectives with progress breakdown.

Title: My Key Results List
User Story: As a team member, I want to see all Key Results in the active sprint where I'm part of the KR team.

Title: Metric Value Update
User Story: As a team member, I want to enter a new value for a metric and save it to track progress.

Title: Progress Calculation and Display
User Story: As a user, I want to see progress as a percentage next to each Key Result and metric.

Title: Rituals Dashboard
User Story: As a user, I want a dashboard showing upcoming and recently completed rituals.

Title: Ritual Create/Edit Form
User Story: As a facilitator, I want to create and edit rituals with type, date, and sprint assignment.

Title: Set Up ALM Pipeline
User Story: As a developer, I want a Dev/Test/Prod ALM pipeline configured, so that solution changes flow through environments safely.

Title: Custom Saved Filters
User Story: As a user, I want to save my current filter combination as a named custom filter for reuse.

Title: View Modes
User Story: As a user, I want to switch between full, compact, and hierarchy views of the OKR list.

Title: Breadcrumb Navigation
User Story: As a user, I want breadcrumb navigation showing my position in the org hierarchy or OKR cascade chain.

Title: Cascade Navigation
User Story: As a user, I want to click cascade links to navigate directly to linked parent/child OKRs.

Title: Program Progress Rollup
User Story: As a user, I want program progress automatically calculated from linked objectives' progress.

Title: Metric Update History
User Story: As a team member, I want to see the history of updates for a metric.

Title: Ritual Facilitation View
User Story: As a facilitator, I want a dedicated view for conducting a ritual session where I can capture notes.

Title: Activity Feed
User Story: As a user, I want to see a chronological activity feed on the program detail page.

Title: Past Rituals List
User Story: As a user, I want to browse past rituals filtered by sprint to review notes and outcomes.

Title: Responsive Layout
User Story: As a user, I want the app to adapt between desktop and tablet screen sizes.

Title: Dark Mode Support
User Story: As a user, I want the app to support a dark color scheme.
